argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opsrbas.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | opsrbas.o | |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) |
| 3 |  | opsrbas.t | |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) |
| 4 |  | opsrsca.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 5 |  | opsrsca.r | |- ( ph -> R e. W ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5 | #P_psrsca | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` S ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-sca | |- Scalar = Slot 5 |
| 8 |  | #P_5nn | |- 5 e. NN |
| 9 |  | #P_5lt10 | |- 5 < 10 |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 7, 8, 9 | #P_opsrbaslem | |- ( ph -> ( Scalar ` S ) = ( Scalar ` O ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` O ) ) |
